siteMetadata.name: Praphulla Bhawsar
siteMetadata.title: Praphulla Bhawsar | Wannabe Psychohistorian
siteMetadata.description: Data Engineer | Full Stack Developer | Geekus Maximus

education.name: M.S. in Computer Science
education.description: NYU Tandon School of Engineering | Aug 2017 - May 2019

projects.name: EpiPath for Digital Pathology
projects.description: Currently developing a zero-cost Annotation, AI Inference and Active Learning engine directly from the web browser on Digital Medical Images in Box.

projects.name: Galaxy Morphology Classification Via Transfer Learning
projects.description: Trained a VGG-19 CNN using the Keras API to classify galaxies by morphology from raw sky survey images. Performed comparisons between uninitialized models and those pre-trained on different datasets, thus demonstrating advantages of transfer learning on even the simplest tasks.

projects.name: DisTwitter
projects.description: A simplistic Twitter clone to run on a distributed architecture with Golang and Protobufs. Integrated a rudimentary file-based database using Viewstamped Replication, along with a neat front-end in ReactJS.

projects.name: Rock-Paper-Scissors with AI
projects.description: Designed a rock-paper-scissors game against an AI. Performed contour detection and feature extraction on webcam feed, followed by real-time gesture recognition using an SVM classifier.

publications.name: (2020) Mortality Tracker: the COVID-19 case for real time web APIs as epidemiology commons
publications.authors: Almeida, J. S., Shiels, M., Bhawsar, P., Patel, B., Nemeth, E., Moffitt, R., Closas, M. G., Freedman, N., & Berrington, A.
